Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav starts a new chapter as captain of the Indian team in T20Is.
Gautam Gambhir takes over as Head Coach of the World Champions in T20s.
Charith Asalanka leads Sri Lankaâ€™s side in the revival attempt.

Miscellaneous Highlights: Nuwan Thushara is out of the series due to a finger injury.

The series consists of three T20Is from July 27 to July 30, 2024.
The Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Pallekele will host the matches.
